A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 29, 2010''', at 14:52 UTC, for fixing a bug where crafting stone items was impossible.<ref>{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-01-29_#minecraft.log|"09:51:55 <Notch> oops, you can't craft the stone itmes.. hold on"}}</ref> It was announced, bundled with [[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20100129-1447|the previous version]], on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 15:04 UTC.<ref name="WoN 0129 release">[[wordofnotch:359717446|Crafting on /indev/ now]] – The Word of Notch, January 29, 2010, 15:04 UTC</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed bug where crafting stone items was impossible.
